00030 CHIMU_PARSER_DATA CHIMU_DATA;
00031 
00032 INS_FORMAT ins_roll_neutral;
00033 INS_FORMAT ins_pitch_neutral;

00035 volatile uint8_t new_ins_attitude;

00037 void ins_init( void )
00038 {
00039   uint8_t ping[7] = {CHIMU_STX, CHIMU_STX, 0x01, CHIMU_BROADCAST, MSG00_PING, 0x00, 0xE6 };
00040   uint8_t rate[12] = {CHIMU_STX, CHIMU_STX, 0x06, CHIMU_BROADCAST, MSG10_UARTSETTINGS, 0x05, 0xff, 0x79, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, 0x76 };  // 50Hz attitude only + SPI
00041   uint8_t quaternions[7] = {CHIMU_STX, CHIMU_STX, 0x01, CHIMU_BROADCAST, MSG09_ESTIMATOR, 0x01, 0x39 }; // 25Hz attitude only + SPI
00042 //  uint8_t rate[12] = {CHIMU_STX, CHIMU_STX, 0x06, CHIMU_BROADCAST, MSG10_UARTSETTINGS, 0x04, 0xff, 0x79, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, 0xd3 }; // 25Hz attitude only + SPI
00043 //  uint8_t euler[7] = {CHIMU_STX, CHIMU_STX, 0x01, CHIMU_BROADCAST, MSG09_ESTIMATOR, 0x00, 0xaf }; // 25Hz attitude only + SPI
00044 
00045 
00046   new_ins_attitude = 0;
00047 
00048   ins_roll_neutral = INS_ROLL_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT;
00049   ins_pitch_neutral = INS_PITCH_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT;
00050 
00051   CHIMU_Init(&CHIMU_DATA);
00052 
00053   // Request Software version
00054   for (int i=0;i<7;i++)
00055   {
00056     InsUartSend1(ping[i]);
00057   }
00058 
00059 
00060   // Quat Filter
00061   for (int i=0;i<7;i++)
00062   {
00063     InsUartSend1(quaternions[i]);
00064   }
00065 
00066 
00067   // 50Hz
00068   CHIMU_Checksum(rate,12);
00069   InsSend(rate,12);
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 void parse_ins_msg( void )
00074 {
00075   while (InsLink(ChAvailable()))
00076   {
00077     uint8_t ch = InsLink(Getch());
00078 
00079     if (CHIMU_Parse(ch, 0, &CHIMU_DATA))
00080     {
00081       if(CHIMU_DATA.m_MsgID==0x03)
00082       {
00083   new_ins_attitude = 1;
00084   RunOnceEvery(25, LED_TOGGLE(3) );
00085   if (CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.phi > M_PI)
00086   {
00087     CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.phi -= 2 * M_PI;
00088   }
00089 
00090   EstimatorSetAtt(CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.phi, CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.psi, CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.theta);
00091   //EstimatorSetRate(ins_p,ins_q);
00092 
00093   DOWNLINK_SEND_AHRS_EULER(DefaultChannel, &CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.phi, &CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.theta, &CHIMU_DATA.m_attitude.euler.psi);
00094 
00095       }
00096     }
00097   }
00098 }
